document_data.mainbody:
ernhollow was a member of the Flaming Fist who served the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Fist Fernhollow was a hin woman with olive skin, and hazel eyes. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist a helmet, a set of chainmail, and a tabard adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia. She wielded a longsword.
In the , Fist Fernhollow was stationed in the Outer City of Baldurs Gate, within the Wyrms Crossing fortress. During the Absolute crisis, Fernhollow and other Fists guarded the new Grand Duke, Enver Gortashâ€”unbeknownst to all one of the men behind the Cult of the Absolute and the strife that befell Baldurs Gate.
